name: cache_usage
author: Nick Hurley <hurley@todesschaf.org>
description:
Collects information on how your cache is used during a browsing session.
Output files can be found in FIREFOXPROFILE/org.todesschaf.mozilla.cacheUsage/*.json (a link to FIREFOXPROFILE can be found in about:support).
If you wish to share your output, please do so in a comment at http://todesschaf.org/posts/2012/06/04/cache-usage-and-you.html
